title: Motorola starts rolling out stable Android 12 to the Moto G30
content:
Back in December last year, Motorola revealed a list of Moto phones that were scheduled to receive the Android 12 update. Although the OEM didnâ€™t mention an exact timeline for each smartphone, the stable Android 12 update has now started seeding to the mid-ranger Moto G30. Over at the official Lenovo Community forums, several Moto

The post Motorola starts rolling out stable Android 12 to the Moto G30 appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Motorola has started pushing the stable Android 12 update to the Moto G30 in Brazil. The OTA also brings February 2022 security patches.
